Main pronunciation 主要发音: sī

Other pronunciations 其它发音: sī,sāi

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to think.

English senses 英语理解: think, consider, ponder; final particle

Usage example 用法举例: 思考 sī kǎo (think)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 296

Shuowen 说文解字: 容也從心囟聲凡思之屬皆從思

恖字的基本解释

恖
sī
古同“思”。

恖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sī］
［《廣韻》息兹切，平之，心。］
［《廣韻》相吏切，去志，心。］
亦作“恖1”。
(1)思想，意念。
(2)指构思。
(3)心情；思绪。
(4)怀念；想望。
(5)思索；考虑。
(6)引申为寻味、体味。
(7)悲伤，哀愁。
(8)道德完备。
(9)诗体的一种。
(10)助词。用于句首或句中。
(11)语气词。用于句末，犹啊。
(12)通“司”。参见“思次”。
(13)姓。明有思志道。见《续通志·氏族六》。
[②]［sāi］
［《集韻》桑才切，平咍，心。］
多须貌。

恖字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恖； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页384第20
【集韻】思，古作恖。註詳五畫。　从囟从心。【六書精蕰】元神何宅？心爲之宅。元神何門？囟爲之門。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sī]
["Guangyun" Xiziqi, Pingzhi, Heart. ]
["Guang Yun" related officials cut, go to the heart, heart. ]
Also known as "恖1".
(1) Thoughts, ideas.
(2) Refers to the idea.
(3) Mood; thoughts.
(4) Nostalgia; longing.
(5) Thinking; considering.
(6) It is extended to taste and taste.
(7) Sadness, sorrow.
(8) Complete morality.
(9) A kind of poetic style.
(10) Particles. Used at the beginning or in a sentence.
(11) Modal particles. Used at the end of a sentence, yes.
(12) Through the "Division". See "Sci".
(13) Last name. Obviously thinking. See "Continued History · Clan Six".
[②]［sāi］
["Ji Yun" Sang Cai cut, flat 咍, heart. ]
Too much appearance.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恖; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 384 to 20
【Jiyun】Thinking, ancient writing. Note five pictures in detail.　From the fontan from the heart. [Six Books] What is the home of Yuanshen? Heart is home. What kind of soul? Fontan is the door.
